title: Anatomy of a Virus: The Making of Antiviral

sources.title: Antiviral
sources.description: In a blackly satirical near future, a thriving industry sells celebrity illnesses to their obsessed fans. Employee Syd March's attempts to exploit the system backfire when they involve him in a potentially deadly mystery.

metadata.Plot: A provocative and comprehensive look into the creation of Brandon Cronenberg's Antiviral.
metadata.Actors: James Cade, Rob Cotterill, Brandon Cronenberg, Niv Fichman
